title: Reasons for caring
creator_credit: Craig Johnson and National Fire Protection Association (U.S.)
brief_description: Following an explosion in an operating theatre, various people comment on the possibilities of fire in a hospital, the precautions to take and the potential for tragedy if a fire does occur. No matter why a fire starts, staff should know exactly what to do and where equipment is stored.
